articles.title: CBN Raises Interest Rate to 18.75% to Combat Inflation
articles.summary: The Central Bank of Nigeria has increased the Monetary Policy Rate by 25 basis points to 18.75% in a bid to tackle rising inflation.

articles.title: Nigeria's Inflation Drops to 21.34% in December
articles.summary: The National Bureau of Statistics reports that inflation fell to 21.34% in December 2023, down from 21.47% in November.

articles.title: NNPC Announces $2.5 Billion Oil Revenue for Q4 2023
articles.summary: The Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation reports $2.5 billion in oil revenue for the fourth quarter of 2023.

articles.title: Naira Exchange Rate Stabilizes at ₦890/$ in Parallel Market
articles.summary: The Nigerian naira has stabilized at around ₦890 to the US dollar in the parallel market following CBN interventions.

articles.title: Federal Government Approves ₦5.4 Trillion Budget for 2024
articles.summary: The Federal Executive Council has approved a ₦5.4 trillion budget for 2024, focusing on infrastructure and social programs.
